Text:
Very good quality for a 2GB rip: A/V 10/10.
Thank you both froggie100 & 26K!
One (small) thing though: I've tried to import (via OCR) the subtitle, but it's French not English. I've found an English one (that work as well with this release too) here: subscene.com/english/Real-Steel/subtitle-524516.aspx
